department.ch: 環境工程研究所碩士班

goal.en: "One of the major goals of this course is to expose you to the relevant topics and issues in Environmental Science and Engineering."
goal.ch: "One of the major goals of this course is to expose you to the relevant topics and issues in Environmental Science and Engineering."

grading.en: "For the 2nd-year M.S. students Assignments (the summary) 40% Presentation 50% Engagement 10% For the 1st-year M.S. students Assignments (the summary) 90% Engagement 10%"
grading.ch: "For the 2nd-year M.S. students Assignments (the summary) 40% Presentation 50% Engagement 10% For the 1st-year M.S. students Assignments (the summary) 90% Engagement 10%"

en.competency: The ability to justify principles of judgment and choice with considering the relation between social welfare and environmental sustainability
The ability to define and analyze environmental issues, to strategically plan and propose potential solutions
The ability to implement scientific knowledge and engineering techniques in the face of environmental problems
The ability to assess prospective needs at the macro level, to formulate decision-making, and to direct R & D.
The ability to lead positive and effective communication, coordination, cooperation and integration.
The ability to persistently innovate intelligent humanities, science and engineering.

ch.competency: 以人為本的社會價值與環境價值判斷與抉擇能力
ch.Assessments: 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 符合系統思維的環境問題發現、分析及解決能力
ch.Assessments: 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 合乎情理法的環境科學知識與工程技術運用能力
ch.Assessments: 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 前瞻宏觀的需求分析、規劃決策及科技研發能力
ch.Assessments: 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 積極有效的溝通表達、協調合作及整合領導能力
ch.Assessments: 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 持續不斷的人文、科學及工程智能學習創新能力
ch.Assessments: 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現
